headline: If You'd Invested $10,000 in Deckers Outdoor Stock 10 Years Ago, Here's How Much You'd Have Today
summary: Deckers Outdoor (NYSE: DECK) is recognized for its footwear brands, including the iconic UGG sheepskin boots that have been widely popular since the early 2000s.  A $10,000 investment in Deckers Outdoor stock 10 years ago would be worth $100,060 today, a cool 901% return, and nearly three times the gain in the S&P 500 over the period.  Despite a record year for revenue and earnings, Deckers Outdoor shares have been extremely volatile since the start of 2025, down about 40% year to date.
